reviews.review: Fantastisch spel, als je deze nog staan hebt kijk dan zeker naar de workshop, er zijn nog duizenden extra spellen om te spelen!
КРУУУУУТЬ, всем советую, и сюжет и кооп там есть ВСЁ, даже редактор уровней
非常棒！双人模式比单人的更棒，足足玩了十来个小时，累的头昏眼花...
Great game. It's fun to play. Sometimes the puzzles can be a little hard but all of them are possible. Great storyline too.
Macht auch nach fast 10 Jahren immer noch sau viel Spaß. Und es geht doch nichts über ein paar "abmunternde" Worte von Glados, wenn man aus Versehen mal zu guter Laune ist :D
Хорошая игра головоломка, но иногда надоедает.
Just started to play and it seems like an interesting game.
игра на логику и мышление, тупа 10/10
好玩！虽然在过程中我很晕和后期需要看攻略，但这不能打消我对他的热爱！还顺带买了1
Super cheap game. Really good fun game to play with a friend, as you progress it really test your team play and brain skill.Grab you self a bargin.
10 из 10 только за концовку а так тут должно быть минимум 1000000 из 10

Потрясающая игра для ко-опа, а также соло прохождения. Отличная озвучка, эмоциональная ГЛаДОС, много оскорблений в сторону главного героя и интересные головоломки в испытательных комнатах. А ещё там есть место, в котором тебя убивают))
頭を使いつつサクサクとゲームが進行するので非常に楽しい
Aussi prenant que le 1er, le jeu mélange toujours réflexion et scénario rondement mené. On se prend au jeu et on se plonge vraiment dans la peau du personnage. A faire et à refaire.

很经典
很不错的解密游戏
有创意工坊，也能自己设计解密
感觉买的很值
Не плохая игра которая заставит как подумать над решением головоломок так и посмеятся с персонажей )
es un guen juego para gujar con amijos

This is one of the best atmospheres ever created in a video game. You feel like a historian going through the remains of the old test chambers of Aperture Labs. Incredibly good single player campaign.

And there is like "another game" which is the Co-op multiplayer campaign. I've really enjoyed this one with friends. Good balance of difficulty and good balance of duration.

One of my top 20 ever.
I love the way the robots talk. Also the turrets are cute.
portal 1 bence daha ıyıydı tavsıye etmem

What a fuckin' masterpiece. lemme just say this. I Played it for 10 hours in just two days. which for me is a record. I have the attention span of a goldfish and it takes me 6 months to finish a six hours long game. but Portal 2 somehow managed to make me addicted. Everyone, gamer or not should play this masterpiece. its a school in game design and puzzle design to be honest and shows what makes Valve such a popular company.


p.s: I recently bought this . the game aged very well. still looks and plays great. the voice acting and sound design is very good.  worth the full price tag, and even double.
heel gaaf spel met hele goeie humor.
очень классная игра тока проблемы с переводом по типу недоговоривания
Great game for killing your friends over and over again, completing the mission, then killing them once again (Only if you have friends though)
神作，买就对了，希望G胖有生之年出个3玩玩
Wirklich immer noch ein wundervolles Spiel was wirklich Spaß macht. Auch wenn manchmal das ein oder andere Rätsel äußerst trickreich ist. Sehr zu empfehlen
Very good followup to the original game. Does everything the first game does and then more. Highly recommended
ох у еть порталы синий оранжевый а еще гель рекомендую
Хорошая игра, всем рекомендую, после прохождения первой части вам дадут Тортик.

不管是單人或是雙人的，都很有趣xD
劇情也算夠長，機關變化性更大了~
Still one of the greatest games out there

This is a great game to any player, newbie or pro, veterans of Portal (2007) or not. Portal 2 has a very stunning soundtrack, equally stunning visuals, an excellent storyline in both the single-player campaign and co-op campaign, very interesting and funny characters, and a very (VERY) unique puzzle/platformer playstyle. If you played Portal (2007) and liked it or even if you liked the concept of Portal (2007) but are on the fence between the two at the moment, I highly recommend Portal 2. As a matter of fact, I would generally recommend Portal 2 to anyone/everyone unless they didn't like the concept of the game in the first place (or if you're used to FPS games that involve a lot of PvP combat, because Portal 2 has none of that).

I personally love this game so much. It was what brought me to PC-gaming all those years ago and it holds a special place in my heart as that and the first FPS game I've ever played.
Vraiment faut-il expliquer ce jeu ? Un chef d'oeuvre!
efsane indirimlerde 2 tl bişe oluyo zaten mutlaka alın değiyor
Интересная и прикольная игра. Интересно проходить уровни и проходить через порталы.

One of, if not one of the best games I've played. It's rich plot as a sequel and bringing good challenges for it's puzzles. Highly recommend.
Really fun game. Not too hard and still has puzzles that make you think very differently to the previous puzzle.
